ygData.subject: Re: begging
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Trying to beg from the boat now generates a You must target an NPC to beg from message. I suppose you could talk a caster friend into summoning a pet at
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 22 Sep 1999, G.W. Willman, IV wrote:
>
> I used to do it just to pass the time on the boat. Its an excellent
> practice dummy, it doesn't attack (but I'd pay to see that - oh wait, I do
> pay, never mind), your skill DOES go up (even on failures as was asked
> before) and... wtf else are you gonna do for 20 mins? :)

Trying to beg from the boat now generates a "You must target
an NPC to beg from" message.

I suppose you could talk a caster friend into summoning a pet
at the first stop and hopping onto the boat (can pets even
follow you onto the boat?), and beg from that.
--
John H. Kim
kim@...
